response.job_title: Electrical engineer graduated from the National University of Colombia interested in the environmetal conservation.
response.summary:
I have an excellent disposition to work and I like to do things fast and well done. Also, I have the enough knowledge to use software like MATLAB, AutoCAD, NEPLAN, Multisim and another useful tools in the electrical engineering. I am clever, honest and I always have a complete disposition to learn.
I have a special interest in the renewable energies, the sustainable use of the energy by the hand of the environmental conservation.
response.skills: Oral Communication, Engineering Documentation, Project Management, Communication, Electrical Engineering, Electrical Design, Engineering, Inglés, Concienciación medioambiental, AutoCAD, Microsoft Excel, Visio, Neplan, Microsoft Word, ETAP, Dialux

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the review and / or preparation of electrical designs both in Autocad, as in calculation memories, including protection coordination analysis, load flow and study harmonics in ETAP, based on the applicable regulations, CREG 038 of 2014, NTC 2050, RETIE, among others.
Also, I am in charge of overseeing the implementation of these, in order to guarantee that they are in accordance with what is designed.
profile_positions.title: Electrical engineer

profile_positions.description:
Drawing schemes in ETAP to analyze the load flow, the protections coordination and harmonics levels. Technical review of new connections as regulating operator of the “Zona Franca de Tocancipá”, including emission of the feasibility, review of designs, work receipt, installation of the measuring group and put in service, all of that based on the regulating electrical frame in Colombia (RETIE, CREG 038, NTC 2050, etc).
Design of new projects, including the calculus memories. 
Analysis of power quality based on the network analyzer results and the meter data.
Management of technical staff to carry out scheduled activities.
Resident of work.
In charge of maintenance plans for electrical networks.
profile_positions.title: electrical engineer

company.name: Globalem
company.description:
En Globalem estamos comprometidos con la sostenibilidad y el medio Ambiente; Somos lideres en la estructuración, diseño, construcción, operación y mantenimiento de SSFV en Colombia y la región

Contamos con más de 70 MWp en diseño/construcción y 40 MWp en operación & mantenimiento con las que estamos potencializando la transformación energética y el ahorro de nuestros clientes
